chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (l : seq expr), uniq (index_not_const l n)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
Inductive expr : Type := Var : nat -> expr | AppExt : forall k : nat, Rn k R -> seq expr -> expr | AppExtD : forall k : nat, Rn k R -> nat -> seq expr -> expr | App : expr -> expr -> expr | Subst : expr -> expr -> expr | Cst : R -> expr | Binary : bop -> expr -> expr -> expr | Unary : uop -> expr -> expr | Int : expr -> expr -> expr -> expr For Var: Argument scope is [nat_scope] For AppExt: Argument scopes are [nat_scope _ list_scope] For AppExtD: Argument scopes are [nat_scope _ nat_scope list_scope] For Cst: Argument scope is [R_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
index_not_const = fun (l : seq expr) (n : nat) => [seq v <- iota 0 (size l) | ~~ is_const (nth (Cst 0) l v) n] : seq expr -> nat -> seq nat Argument scopes are [list_scope nat_scope]
uniq = fun T : eqtype.Equality.type => fix uniq (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqtype.Equality.type, seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T) -> bool Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ list_scope]
interp_set_nth : forall (n : nat) (l : seq R) (e : expr), interp (set_nth 0 l n (nth 0 l n)) e = interp l e
domain_rect : forall P : domain -> Type, P Never -> P Always -> (forall (P0 : R -> Prop) (e : expr), P (Partial P0 e)) -> (forall (n k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable n k r l)) -> (forall (n n0 k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable2 n n0 k r l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous n e)) -> (forall (n n0 : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous2 n n0 e)) -> (forall e e0 e1 : expr, P (Integrable e e0 e1)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e e0 e1 : expr), P (ParamIntegrable n e e0 e1)) ->...-> forall d : domain, P d
domain_ind : forall P : domain -> Prop, P Never -> P Always -> (forall (P0 : R -> Prop) (e : expr), P (Partial P0 e)) -> (forall (n k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable n k r l)) -> (forall (n n0 k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable2 n n0 k r l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous n e)) -> (forall (n n0 : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous2 n n0 e)) -> (forall e e0 e1 : expr, P (Integrable e e0 e1)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e e0 e1 : expr), P (ParamIntegrable n e e0 e1)) ->...-> forall d : domain, P d
domain_rec : forall P : domain -> Set, P Never -> P Always -> (forall (P0 : R -> Prop) (e : expr), P (Partial P0 e)) -> (forall (n k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable n k r l)) -> (forall (n n0 k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable2 n n0 k r l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous n e)) -> (forall (n n0 : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous2 n n0 e)) -> (forall e e0 e1 : expr, P (Integrable e e0 e1)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e e0 e1 : expr), P (ParamIntegrable n e e0 e1)) ->...-> forall d : domain, P d
is_const_correct : forall (e : expr) (n : nat), is_const e n = true -> forall (l : seq R) (x1 x2 : R), interp (set_nth 0 l n x1) e = interp (set_nth 0 l n x2) e
mkseq_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (f : nat -> eqtype.Equality.sort T) (n : nat), ssrfun.injective f -> uniq (mkseq f n)
expr_ind : forall P : expr -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (AppExt k r l)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (n : nat) (l : seq expr), P (AppExtD k r n l)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (App e e0)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Subst e e0)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) -> (forall (b : bop) (e : expr), P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Binary b e e0)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
expr_rect : forall P : expr -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (AppExt k r l)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (n : nat) (l : seq expr), P (AppExtD k r n l)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (App e e0)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Subst e e0)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) -> (forall (b : bop) (e : expr), P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Binary b e e0)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
expr_rec : forall P : expr -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (AppExt k r l)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (n : nat) (l : seq expr), P (AppExtD k r n l)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (App e e0)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Subst e e0)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) -> (forall (b : bop) (e : expr), P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Binary b e e0)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l

iota_uniq : forall m n : nat, uniq (iota m n)
interp_domain = fix interp_domain (l : seq R) (d : domain) {struct d} : Prop := match d with | Never => False | Always => True | Partial p e => p (interp l e) | Derivable n k f le => ex_derive_Rn k f n (nth 0 [seq interp l i | i <- le]) | Derivable2 m n k f le => let le' := [seq interp l i | i <- le] in locally_2d (fun u v : R => ex_derive_Rn k f m (fun i : nat => if ssrnat.eqn i m then u else if ssrnat.eqn i n then v else nth 0 le' i)) (nth 0 le' m) (nth 0 le' n) /\ continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => Derive_Rn k f m (fun i : nat => if ssrnat.eqn i m then u else if ssrnat.eqn i...
apply_ext : forall (T : Type) (k : nat) (f : Rn k T) (g1 g2 : nat -> R), (forall n : nat, (n < k)%nat -> g1 n = g2 n) -> apply k f g1 = apply k f g2
mem_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : eqtype.Equality.sort ssrnat.nat_eqType), (i \in iota m n) = ssrnat.leq m i && ssrnat.leq (S i) (ssrnat.addn m n)
rot_uniq : forall (n0 : nat) (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq (rot n0 s) = uniq s
has_quality : forall (n : nat) (T : Type), qualifier n T -> {pred T}
expr_ind' : forall P : expr -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (f : Rn k R) (le : seq expr), foldr (fun (e : expr) (acc : Prop) => P e /\ acc) True le -> P (AppExt k f le)) -> (forall (k : nat) (f : Rn k R) (n : nat) (le : seq expr), foldr (fun (e : expr) (acc : Prop) => P e /\ acc) True le -> P (AppExtD k f n le)) -> (forall e1 e2 : expr, P e1 -> P e2 -> P (App e1 e2)) -> (forall e1 e2 : expr, P e1 -> P e2 -> P (Subst e1 e2)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
nth_set_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat) (y : T), ssrfun.eqfun (nth x0 (set_nth x0 s n y)) (ssrfun.fun_of_simpl (ssrfun.SimplFunDelta (fun _ : eqtype.Equality.sort ssrnat.nat_eqType => eqtype.app_fdelta (eqtype.FunDelta (aT:=ssrnat.nat_eqType) n y) (nth x0 s))))
nseq = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) => ncons n x [::] : forall T : Type, nat -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope _]
mask_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s -> forall m : bitseq, uniq (mask m s)
rot = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => drop n s ++ take n s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope list_scope]
ssrnat.ltnn : forall n : nat, ssrnat.leq (S n) n = false
interp = fix interp (l : seq R) (e : expr) {struct e} : R := match e with | Var n => nth R0 l n | AppExt k f le => apply k f (nth 0 [seq interp l i | i <- le]) | AppExtD k f n le => Derive_Rn k f n (nth 0 [seq interp l i | i <- le]) | App e1 e2 => interp (interp l e2 :: l) e1 | Subst e1 e2 => interp (set_nth R0 l 0 (interp l e2)) e1 | Cst c => c | Binary o e1 e2 => match o with | Eplus => Rplus | Emult => Rmult end (interp l e1) (interp l e2) | Unary o e0 => match o with | Eopp => Ropp | Einv => Rinv | Efct f _ _ | Efct' f _ _ _ => f end (interp l e...
permutations_all_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s -> all uniq (permutations (T:=T) s)
rem_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s -> uniq (rem (T:=T) x s)
ssrnat.leqNgt : forall m n : nat, ssrnat.leq m n = ~~ ssrnat.leq (S n) m
subseq_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s1 s2 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), subseq s1 s2 -> uniq s2 -> uniq s1
perm_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s1 s2 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), perm_eq s1 s2 -> uniq s1 = uniq s2
pmap_sub_uniq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (p : pred (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) (sT : eqtype.subType (T:=eqtype.Equality.sort T) p) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s -> uniq (pmap eqtype.insub s)

```coq
Fixpoint index_not_const (l : seq expr) (n : nat) : seq nat :=
  match l with
  | [] => []
  | v :: l' => if is_const v n then index_not_const l' n else nth v (iota 0 (size l')) :: index_not_const l' n
  end.

Lemma index_not_const_uniq : forall (l : seq expr) (n : nat),
  uniq (index_not_const l n).
Proof.
  intros l n.
  induction l as [|v l' IHl'] using (nat_ind).
  - simpl. constructor.
  - simpl. destruct (is_const v n) as [H|H].
    + apply IHl'.
    + apply IHl'. apply (ssrnat.leqNgt (size l')) H. apply (ssrnat.ltnn (size l')). apply (ssrnat.leqNgt (size l') (S n)).
Qed.
```
